TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDocumentStructureProvider

summary.span: Defines a method for adding the part of XML Paper Specification (XPS) to an XPS package.

span.span: Defines a method for adding the part of XML Paper Specification (XPS) to an XPS package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊`DocumentStructure`元素[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]封裝，請參閱中的第 9 章[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]規格，您可以在取得[XPS： 規格和授權下載](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。For more information about the `DocumentStructure` element of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package, see chapter 9 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關`DocumentStructure`元素[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]封裝，請參閱第 9 的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]規格，您可以在取得[XPS： 規格和授權下載](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。For more information about the `DocumentStructure` element of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package, see chapter 9 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
